name: Korgan
summary:
Korgan is an episodic dungeon-crawler game. 
 
While playing the story mode you can switch your character in real time to face different kind of enemies or obstacles. 
 
Combine their abilities: freeze an enemy with the Mage, switch your character to Warrior and finish him with brute force, or perhaps shoot him from a safe range with the Hunter? Each character have their own abilities, strengths and weakness.
storyline:
The heroes were captured by The Shadow Legion. Join Korgan, Sedine and Meldie on this epic adventure against an ancient dark guild. 
 
The Shadow Legion is the first episode and include: 
● Single-player campaign The Shadow Legion. 
● New enemies, dungeons, items, equipment, weapons and bosses. 
● Merchant NPCs to purchase and sell items in the single-player campaign. 
● Multiplayer matches: arena, cooperative dungeons and survival mode. 
● New maps for arena and survival game modes. 
● Skins for warrior, mage and hunter.
